SNEWS_PT.snews_pub¶

An interface for SNEWS member experiment to publish their observation and heartbeat messages.

Created: August 2021 Authors: Melih Kara Sebastian Torres-Lara

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Publisher

Class in charge of publishing messages to SNEWS-hop sever.

CoincidenceTier

CoincidenceTier

SignificanceTier

SignificanceTier

TimingTier

Timing Tier

Retraction

Retraction

Heartbeat

Publish Heartbeat message.
class SNEWS_PT.snews_pub.Publisher(env_path=None, verbose=True, auth=True)[source]¶

Class in charge of publishing messages to SNEWS-hop sever. This class acts as a context manager.

Parameters

  • env_path ('str') – path to SNEWS env file, defaults to tes_config.env if None is passed.

  • verbose (bool) – Option to display message when publishing.

  • auth (bool) – Option to run hop-Stream without authentication. Pass False to do so

__enter__(self)[source]¶
__exit__(self, *args)[source]¶
send(self, message)[source]¶

This method will set the sent_time and send the message to the hop broker.

Parameters

message (dict) – observation message.

display_message(self, message)[source]¶
class SNEWS_PT.snews_pub.CoincidenceTier[source]¶

CoincidenceTier Container class for CoincidenceTier, takes in message info and sets up schema.

detector_name[source]¶

Name of your detector. Use snews_pt_utils.retrieve_detectors() to see the available detector names.

Type

str

p_val¶

p-value of nu signal.

Type

float

nu_time¶

nu arrival time. formats %y/%m/%d_%H:%M:%S:%f or %H:%M:%S:%f

Type

str

machine_time[source]¶

time recorded by detector. formats %y/%m/%d_%H:%M:%S:%f or %H:%M:%S:%f

Type

str

message_type[source]¶

Name of tier, used to format the schema

Type

str (default:’CoincidenceTier’)

extra¶

Use this in case you want to send extra information. Make sure it’s formatted as a dict.

Type

dict (default: None)

neutrino_time :str[source]¶

class SNEWS_PT.snews_pub.Retraction[source]¶

Retraction Container class for retraction messages. .. attribute:: which_tier

Name of tier you want to retract from,

‘CoincidenceTier’ ‘SigTier’ ‘TimeTier’

type

str

n_retract_latest[source]¶

Number of most recent message you want to retract

Type

int

detector_name[source]¶

Name of your detector. Use snews_pt_utils.retrieve_detectors() to see the available detector names.

Type

str

message_type[source]¶

Set message type for schema

Type

str (default: ‘FalseOBS’

machine_time[source]¶

time recorded by detector. formats %y/%m/%d_%H:%M:%S:%f or %H:%M:%S:%f

Type

str (default: None)

false_mgs_id[source]¶

specific id of message you want to retract.

Type

str (default: None)

retraction_reason[source]¶

Reason why you are retracting.

Type

str (default: None)

extra[source]¶

Use this in case you want to send extra information. Make sure it’s formatted as a dict!!!

Type

dict (default: None)

class SNEWS_PT.snews_pub.Heartbeat[source]¶

Publish Heartbeat message. We recommend submitting messages every 3 minutes Ideally, this function should be called after fetching the status of the detector

Parameters

  • status (str (“ON”/”OFF”)) – status of the detector at the time of invocation

  • detector_name (str) – name of the detector

status :str[source]¶
detector_name :str[source]¶
machine_time :str[source]¶
extra :dict[source]¶
